titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: At Knowling's request I celebrated the Holy Communion at 8 a.m. All the Chapter were present except Nickson, who is in Wales, and I think every family in the College was represented.

At 1 p.m. the Funeral took place. The Bishop read the lesson, & gave the Benediction. Watkins read some of the prayers, & I read the concluding prayer. All was very Christian & solemn. The little man bore himself well throughout.
